qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Indianola General Hospital and Granville General Hospital, what were the chief complaints of patients C. Cruz and J. Rodriguez?

content: Fever, chills, back pain for 2 days
Chief Complaint: Local redness, swelling, heat, and pain on the right forearm for 3 days.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Indianola General Hospital, patient C. Cruz's chief complaint was fever, chills, and back pain for 2 days. According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital, patient J. Rodriguez's chief complaint was local redness, swelling, heat, and pain on the right forearm for 3 days.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Indianola General Hospital and Granville General Hospital, what were the preliminary diagnoses for patients C. Cruz and J. Rodriguez?

content: Preliminary Diagnosis: Furuncle of the right forearm

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Indianola General Hospital, patient C. Cruz was preliminarily diagnosed with Acute Pyelonephritis. According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital, patient J. Rodriguez was preliminarily diagnosed with a Furuncle of the right forearm.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Indianola General Hospital and Granville General Hospital, what were the auxiliary examination findings for patients C. Cruz and J. Rodriguez?

content: Auxiliary Examination: Complete Blood Count (CBC) showed mild leukocytosis, no other significant findings

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Indianola General Hospital, patient C. Cruz's auxiliary examination showed urinalysis with pyuria and bacteriuria, and a CBC with elevated WBC count. According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital, patient J. Rodriguez's auxiliary examination showed a CBC with mild leukocytosis.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Indianola General Hospital and Granville General Hospital, what were the long-term medical orders for patients C. Cruz and J. Rodriguez?

content: Long-term Orders: Topical antibiotics (Mupirocin ointment) applied to affected area twice daily; Oral antibiotics (Cephalexin 250 mg) three times daily for 7 days

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Indianola General Hospital, patient C. Cruz's long-term medical orders included Ceftriaxone 1g IV q24h, antipyretics PRN, maintaining strict I/O charting, and monitoring vitals q4h. According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital, patient J. Rodriguez's long-term medical orders included topical antibiotics (Mupirocin ointment) applied to the affected area twice daily and oral antibiotics (Cephalexin 250 mg) three times daily for 7 days.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Indianola General Hospital and Granville General Hospital, who was admitted later, C. Cruz or J. Rodriguez?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: C. Cruz was admitted on 17th February, and J. Rodriguez was admitted on 26th February. J. Rodriguez was admitted later.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Indianola General Hospital and Granville General Hospital, whose pulse rate is the same, C. Cruz or J. Rodriguez?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: C. Cruz's pulse rate is 90 bpm, and J. Rodriguez's pulse rate is also 90 bpm. Both C. Cruz and J. Rodriguez have the same pulse rate.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Indianola General Hospital and Granville General Hospital, who had a higher temperature at the time of admission, C. Cruz or J. Rodriguez?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: C. Cruz's temperature was 38.8째C, and J. Rodriguez's temperature was 37째C. C. Cruz had a higher temperature at the time of admission.
